WorkItem.Description:
On loading a character from battle.net, mouse-over for the two items Tia's Grace (heroic) and Arrowsinger Legguards shows "0 [stat] -> [stat]".  Clicking the reforge button shows the available options and correct amount of rating to be reforged.  On load, these numbers aren't being counted in the simulation:  Rawr shows I have 22 expertise (436 rating), but the in-game character sheet shows 25 (532 rating), the difference being exactly the number of Mastery reforged to Expertise on Arrowsinger Legguards.
Â 
Similar problems will require user monitoring until fixed in Rawr:  I had to select "Not Reforged" and then the correct reforging until these stats showed correctly in the sim.
WorkItem.Summary: [LoadCharacter] Certain reforges not being accounted for
